name: The UnderGround (TheUnderground04)
description:
The UnderGround:

The Underground is a centralized HUB for two of the decade’s most popular games: Valorant and League of Legends. Both are high competitive and have a steep learning curve. PTP connects new and existing players to a plethora of resources. Through a simple click of a button, find tons of information that the players can then stylize themselves.

How We Made it:

The themes we wanted to encompass were: a rpg game aesthetic “guild” interaction. Through thorough interviews, we wanted an interactive way to introduce new players and current players of the two games to resources they may not know they had access to.

How To Play:

You will meet the Goddess of the region upon arrival. She will prompt you with dialogue options that you can click through, so have fun talking to her! She will then drop you off onto the map, and you can use WASD to move around.
